attributes.action: There is a current petition to make smoking whilst driving, illegal. Please ignore it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are too many restrictions within our society already, causing our country to have many police state attributes. Smokers are not criminals. The current petition to make smoking whilst driving illegal is a further restriction of our rights.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
